cab.content: HUHFrom Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, Sth April 1920.(Received 9th, 10.30 a.m.)Priority A.397 S. Afghanistan. My telegram of the 4th April, 378 S. Afghan delegates arrived frontier 7th instant without previous intimation. They .consist of Tarzi, Foreign. Minister, Gliulam Muhammad, Commerce Minister, Abdul Hacli Khan, Narinjar Das and Colonel Pir Muhammad. Party was politely requested by Chief Commissioner to wait as no warning of their arrival bad been received and arrange--ments for their reception and conveyance to Mussoorie were not yet ready, but as letter from Amir is said to be on its way Grant has been instructed to forward party as early as possible.
